bug.author: alexrudnick
bug.summary: broken links in word2vec tutorial docs
bug.description: Some of the links to word2vec_basic.py currently give a 404 -- they point to <denchmark-link:https://tensorflow.googlesource.com/tensorflow/+/master/tensorflow/g3doc/tutorials/word2vec/word2vec_basic.py>https://tensorflow.googlesource.com/tensorflow/+/master/tensorflow/g3doc/tutorials/word2vec/word2vec_basic.py</denchmark-link> . They should probably point to the version at <denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/master/tutorials/word2vec/word2vec_basic.py>https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/master/tutorials/word2vec/word2vec_basic.py</denchmark-link> , right?

comments.comment: Yeah, we haven't pushed the new website that has these link fixes yet. We'll probably do so soon.
